Title: Pattern Recognition and Image Processing Lab at MSU
Body: > <!-- Updated and redesigned October 96> <!-- Most recent changes: Oct 96, Karissa Miller> Pattern Recognition and Image Processing Lab at MSU Pattern Recognition and Image Processing Lab Michigan State University [ General Info | Seminar | Projects | People | Alumni | Tech Reports and Data | Software | Equipment ] The Pattern Recognition and Image Processing laboratory ( PRIP ) supports the research of a number of faculty, visiting scholars, and graduate students in the areas of pattern recognition, image processing, computer vision, and vision-guided robotics.
